report_title: Coated & Laminated Paper Manufacturing in the US
executive_summary: Coated and laminated paper manufacturers are essential to the economy, as packaging, adhesives and other goods are necessary to transport and sell other goods. But manufacturers have been at odds with technological

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: CHANGES IN MEDIA LEAVE COATED AND LAMINATED PAPER BEHIND
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: As print media has fallen out of fashion in favor of digital alternatives, coated and laminated paper manufacturers have paid the price. Print advertising used to be a flourishing industry that couldn't order enough paper to keep up, but steep declines have pushed this market to the backburner.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Environmental Consciousness Provides a Bright Spot for Manufacturers
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The steady rise of environmental consciousness bodes well for the industry. Consumers and businesses are switching from plastic packaging to paper in many instances. Notably, many grocery stores now use paper bags at checkout. As time goes on, companies will switch out plastic for paper for an increasing number of products.

Coated and laminated paper products are lightweight and easy to ship, opening the door for international trade to significantly impact this industry. Import penetration has ramped up in recent years, as an appreciating US dollar and inexpensive labor abroad have increased the appeal of foreign goods.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Revenue and Profit Declines Force Consolidation
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Since the industry has suffered because of the increased prevalence of substitutes at home and abroad, companies have left the industry at a growing rate.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: SHIFTING ECONOMIC CONDITIONS WILL PRESSURE MANUFACTURERS
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The continued shift from plastic to paper and increased consumer spending in the short term will uplift manufacturers. Persistent inflation and the repeated interest rate hikes levied by the Federal Reserve will threaten prospects.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: THE CONTINUED DECLINE OF PRINT MEDIA WILL CAUSE THE INDUSTRY TO CONTRACT
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Although print advertising expenditure has temporarily plateaued, it will continue its steep fall in the near future as businesses fight for digital advertising space.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: IMPROVED INTERNATIONAL TRADE CONDITIONS LESSEN PRESSURE ON PRODUCERS
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The trade-weighted index will fall moving forward, making imports comparatively more expensive while increasing the appeal of exports abroad.

industry_definition: Companies in this industry primarily manufacture products that include coated or laminated paper and packaging, multiwall bags and laminated aluminum foil for flexible packaging. Industry operators also purchase raw materials, such as paper and paperboard, then process them with plastic, clay, latex and metal to create industry products. This industry does not include companies that manufacture paper from pulp; these companies are part of the Paper Mills industry (IBISWorld report 32212).
key_trends: The decline in print media cuts out a major downstream market.
High transportation costs make foreign-made alternatives appealing.
Environmental consciousness is raising demand for plastic substitutions.
Steadily rising paper prices continue to pressure profit.
Decline of print advertising cuts out a key market.
The rapid decline of print advertising cuts out a key market.
Environmental regulation on inputs and waste.
Operating near paper mills reduces costs.
Shifting downstream markets leads to buyer competition.

market_segmentation.segment_description: The Food and Beverage Sector is the Leading Consumer of Coated Paper Products.
Financial and Professional Services Continue to Print.
Printers and Media are Still Hanging On.
Retailers and Wholesalers Use and Resell Paper Goods.

products_and_services.product_description: Pressure-sensitive products are primarily made up of adhesives, including tapes, labels, stickers and a variety of other products.
Paper packaging is rising in popularity, largely spurred by the decline of plastic packaging as environmental consciousness grows.

products_and_services.product_or_service: Uncoated and Coated Paper Bags and Sacks
products_and_services.product_description: Retail stores have been pressured, and sometimes forced, to stop using plastic bags in favor of paper alternatives.

products_and_services.product_or_service: Coated and Laminated Paper Not for Packaging
products_and_services.product_description: The decline in consumption of print media has pushed downstream companies to focus on their digital content.
Surface-coated paperboard makes boxes for food, beverages, electronic devices and other products.
Specialty and custom coated and laminated products are handled by smaller manufacturers which can alter their production process.

demand_determinants.determinant_description: Consumer spending is directly tied to industry success.
Coated and laminated paper products are used to pack many different food products.
Print advertising has historically been paramount for coated and laminated paper manufacturers.
Paper wholesalers purchase large volumes of coated and laminated paper from manufacturers.
International trade is vital to the coated and laminated paper manufacturing industry.

international_trade_points.trade_title: AN APPRECIATING US DOLLAR HAS LED TO INCREASED IMPORT PENETRATION
international_trade_points.trade_description: Recently, the US dollar has increased in strength compared with its trading partners' currencies.

international_trade_points.trade_title: THE NATURE OF COATED AND LAMINATED PAPER PRODUCTS LENDS THEM TO INTERNATIONAL TRADE
international_trade_points.trade_description: Coated and laminated paper products are light and thin, making the shipment of a high quantity of them fairly easy.

business_locations.location_description: This region provides easy access to Canada, the largest purchaser of US exports.
Cities including New York City in the Mid-Atlantic are sources of high levels of demand.
The Southeast is home to the country's highest percentage of paper mills.

regulations_points.regulation_description: As the government continues to pass legislation focuses on reducing the environmental impact of production.
Many cities and states have started to ban plastic bags, pushing retailers and wholesalers to paper alternatives.

barriers_points.barrier_description: The industry is in the decline stage of its life cycle, indicating moderate barriers to entry.
The industry has a high and increasing level of globalization, creating moderate barriers to entry.
The industry has a high and steady level of competition, resulting in moderate barriers to entry.

factors_increased_barrier: The industry is in the decline stage of its life cycle.
factors_decreased_barrier: The industry has a low level of market share concentration.

basis_points.basis_description: Manufacturers are fighting for buyers as downstream markets like print media consumption decline, pushing them towards other buyers.
Quick access to products is key for buyers, keeping market concentration low as transportation costs are lower for nearby manufacturers.
Packaging for large volumes of products is less expensive when transportation is quick from nearby manufacturers.

concentration_points.concentration_description: Quick access to local buyers keeps market share concentration low.
Easy access to packaging for manufacturers is essential, so there is room for smaller manufacturers strategically placed around the US.
Quick transportation enables downstream manufacturers to package, label and ship goods quicker while reducing costs.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: The cost of paper has risen recently, raising purchase costs for industries enduring low demand.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_title: Labor intensity is high in this industry
capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: Labor intensity is high in this industry, as even though many production steps are automated, workers are required for a large portion of the process.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_title: Low rate of new patents and patent concentration
capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: The industry is experiencing a low level of both the rate of new patents and the concentration of patents in the industry.

volatility_points.volatility_description: The decline in print media subscriptions and print advertising expenditure has led to a steady decline in manufacturers.

volatility_points.volatility_title: The shift away from plastic pushes against declines
volatility_points.volatility_description: The steady rise of environmental consciousness has pushed consumers, businesses and the government to change.

technological_change_points.technological_change_title: Pressure-sensitive products account for the bulk of revenue
technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Pressure-sensitive products are primarily made up of adhesives, including tapes, labels, stickers and a variety of other products.

technological_change_points.technological_change_title: Coated and Laminated Packaging Paper is Used for a Wide Variety of Goods
technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Paper packaging is rising in popularity, largely spurred by the decline of plastic packaging as environmental consciousness grows.

FAQs.question: Was your company affected by import competition during the height of the COVID-19 pandemic?
FAQs.answer: Since industry manufacturers produce packaging, they are impacted not only by direct import competition but also by offshoring in manufacturing industries that typically purchase their products.

FAQs.question: Have any export opportunities presented themselves to your company as the economy gradually reopens in 2021?
FAQs.answer: Export performance is expected to drive revenue over the next five years.

FAQs.question: Has your company been exposed to volatile input prices caused by pandemic trade interruptions?
FAQs.answer: Industry selling prices tend to move in line with the cost of raw paper.
